General.Name: Hengli Industrial Development Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Hengli Industrial Development Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automobile air conditioning equipment in China. The company offers air conditioning equipment for car, truck, engineering, and special vehicles; and air conditioning compressors and other products. It is also involved in real estate management and investment management activities. The company was founded in 1993 is based in Yueyang, China.
